statements: SELECT * FROM security_events;
SELECT event_name, event_type FROM security_events;
SELECT event_id, event_date, event_name FROM security_events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_type FROM security_events WHERE event_type = 'Login';
SELECT event_name, source_ip, destination_ip FROM security_events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_id, event_name, event_date FROM security_events WHERE event_type = 'Login Success' ORDER BY event_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM security_events WHERE source_ip = '192.168.1.10' AND event_type IN ('Login Success', 'Failed Attempt') ORDER BY event_date ASC;
SELECT event_name, source_ip, destination_ip, event_description FROM security_events WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY event_id DESC;
SELECT event_type, COUNT(*) AS event_count FROM security_events GROUP BY event_type HAVING event_count > 5 ORDER BY event_count DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT source_ip FROM security_events WHERE event_type = 'Failed Attempt' ORDER BY source_ip ASC;
SELECT * FROM threat_events ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_type FROM threat_events WHERE event_type = 'Malware';
SELECT event_name, event_timestamp FROM threat_events WHERE event_type = 'Ransomware' ORDER BY event_timestamp ASC;
SELECT event_name, event_description FROM threat_events WHERE event_description LIKE '%attack%';
SELECT log_timestamp, log_source, log_message FROM security_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT event_id, event_name, event_type FROM threat_events WHERE event_timestamp > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM threat_events WHERE event_type = 'Malware' ORDER BY event_id ASC
SELECT event_id, event_name, event_description FROM threat_events WHERE event_name LIKE '%ransomware%'
SELECT event_id, event_description FROM threat_events WHERE event_timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30' ORDER BY event_id DESC
SELECT log_id, log_timestamp, log_message FROM security_logs WHERE log_source = 'Firewall' ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM SIEM_Events;
SELECT event_id, event_type, event_description FROM SIEM_Events ORDER BY event_time DESC;
SELECT event_id, event_type FROM SIEM_Events WHERE event_type = 'Login';
SELECT * FROM SIEM_Incidents WHERE incident_type = 'Security Breach' ORDER BY incident_time DESC;
SELECT event_id, event_type, alert_time FROM SIEM_Events JOIN SIEM_Alerts ON SIEM_Events.event_id = SIEM_Alerts.event_id ORDER BY alert_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM SIEM_Events ORDER BY event_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT event_id, event_type, event_description FROM SIEM_Events WHERE event_type = 'Login' ORDER BY event_time ASC;

SELECT incident_id, incident_type, incident_time, alert_type FROM SIEM_Incidents JOIN SIEM_Alerts ON SIEM_Incidents.alert_id = SIEM_Alerts.alert_id WHERE alert_type = 'Critical' ORDER BY incident_time DESC;
SELECT event_type, COUNT(*) AS event_count FROM SIEM_Events GROUP BY event_type HAVING event_count > 5 ORDER BY event_count DESC;

SELECT SIEM_Events.event_id, SIEM_Events.event_type, SIEM_Alerts.alert_type, SIEM_Incidents.incident_type FROM SIEM_Events LEFT JOIN SIEM_Alerts ON SIEM_Events.event_id = SIEM_Alerts.event_id LEFT JOIN SIEM_Incidents ON SIEM_Alerts.alert_id = SIEM_Incidents.alert_id ORDER BY SIEM_Events.event_id ASC, SIEM_Alerts.alert_id DESC, SIEM_Incidents.incident_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM SecurityEvents;
SELECT event_name, event_time FROM SecurityEvents WHERE event_id = 1;
SELECT event_name, event_description FROM SecurityEvents ORDER BY event_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM ThreatIndicators WHERE indicator_type = 'Malware' ORDER BY indicator_timestamp ASC;
SELECT incident_type, incident_description, incident_time FROM SecurityIncidents;
SELECT * FROM SecurityEvents WHERE event_id = 1;
SELECT event_name, event_description FROM SecurityEvents WHERE event_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT incident_type, incident_description FROM SecurityIncidents WHERE incident_type = 'Data Breach';
SELECT * FROM ThreatIndicators WHERE indicator_id > 100 ORDER BY indicator_timestamp DESC;
SELECT action_type, action_description FROM ResponseActions WHERE action_timestamp < '2022-03-15';
SELECT * FROM alerts;
SELECT description, severity FROM incidents WHERE status = 'open';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM devices WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT log_id, log_type, timestamp FROM logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM alerts ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT alert_id, timestamp, severity FROM alerts WHERE severity = 'High' AND description LIKE '%critical%';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT device_name, device_type, status FROM devices ORDER BY device_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT incident_id, timestamp, status FROM incidents ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
